mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.SYS_IP, A.SYS_PORT, A.SYS_NM, B.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS, A.MNGR_NM, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.SYS_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND A.SYS_IP LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND A.MNGR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND B.CODE_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(A.SYS_IP) as cnt FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.SYS_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND A.SYS_IP LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND A.MNGR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND B.CODE_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'

SELECT A.SYS_IP, A.SYS_PORT, A.SYS_NM, A.MNGR_NM, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, B.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS, A.CREAT_DT, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE A.SYS_IP = #{sysIp} AND A.SYS_PORT = #{sysPort}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG SET SYS_IP=#{sysIp}, SYS_PORT=#{sysPort}, SYS_NM=#{sysNm}, MNGR_NM=#{mngrNm}, MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES=#{mngrEmailAddr}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE SYS_IP = #{oldSysIp} AND SYS_PORT = #{oldSysPort}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG ( SYS_IP, SYS_PORT, SYS_NM, MNGR_NM, MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{sysIp}, #{sysPort}, #{sysNm}, #{mngrNm}, #{mngrEmailAddr}, sysdate, #{frstRegisterId}, sysdate, #{lastUpdusrId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(A.SYS_IP) as cnt FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNGLOGINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG B ON A.SYS_IP = B.SYS_IP AND A.SYS_PORT = B.SYS_PORT LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C ON C.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = C.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND to_char(A.CREAT_DT, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') BETWEEN #{searchBgnDt} AND #{searchEndDt}
AND A.SYS_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND A.SYS_IP LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND B.MNGR_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND C.CODE_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'

SELECT A.SYS_IP, A.SYS_PORT, A.LOG_ID, A.SYS_NM, B.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS, A.LOG_INFO, A.CREAT_DT, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNGLOGINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE A.SYS_IP = #{sysIp} AND A.SYS_PORT = #{sysPort} AND A.LOG_ID = #{logId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNGLOGINFO ( SYS_IP, SYS_PORT, LOG_ID, SYS_NM, MNTRNG_STTUS, LOG_INFO, CREAT_DT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{sysIp}, #{sysPort}, #{logId}, #{sysNm}, #{mntrngSttus}, #{logInfo}, TO_DATE(#{creatDt}, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), sysdate, #{frstRegisterId}, sysdate, #{lastUpdusrId} )
